author: 185johnbull
title: The worst staff!!!
text:
Hot breakfast consists of scrambled egg and bacon. Everything else is cold. The staff are so rude and to be honest the only time the lady at reception smiled was when we left. The room was big but the bed was rock hard. Bathroom was good and clean. The pool was closed and the bar selection was crap. Evening meal don't bother trust me.
There is a hotel shuttle which will take you to the nearest metro stop but remember when you return its a 45min walk back to hotel. If you take the bus it stops on a dual carriage way and you have to walk on the hard shoulder up a slip road to get back to the hotel.
I will not be going back.
Room Tip: A double bed is 2 singles joint together and I fell in between a few times. See more room tips
